description.value:
The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll [[/r 1d12]] twice and consult the following list:

  1. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Acid Arrow]{Acid Arrow};
  2. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Blur]{Blur};
  3. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Hideous Laughter]{Hideous Laughter};
  4. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Humanoid Form]{Humanoid Form};
  5. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Object]{Illusory Object};
  6. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Mirror Image]{Mirror Image};
  7. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Resist Energy]{Resist Energy};
  8. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.See Invisibility]{See Invisibility};
  9. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Shatter]{Shatter};
  10. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Sound Burst]{Sound Burst};
  11. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Spider Climb]{Spider Climb};
  12. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Telekinetic Maneuver]{Telekinetic Maneuver}.

You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled doubles) as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
